channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Spirit Airlines adds small Georgia airport with first route in new airline pact
item.description: Spirit Airlines will connect Macon, Georgia, and Fort Lauderdale beginning in October.

item.title: 11 credit cards that can get you $1,000 or more in first-year value
item.description: How much are you getting from your credit card? If it's not enough, consider one of these choices that can provide at least $1,000 in value in the fir...

item.title: Hyatt just launched a convenient new award availability feature
item.description: World of Hyatt just announced a website enhancement that allows WoH members to conveniently search for award availability based on a number of factors...

item.title: Select cards now come with a complimentary Uber One membership
item.description: If you have a select Delta Amex card or the Apple Card, you can receive a complimentary Uber One membership via statements credits or a free trial.

item.title: Stay near Yellowstone this summer using points at this brand-new, suite-style Marriott
item.description: The TownePlace Suites Bozeman West opened Thursday and offers 107 extended-stay suites complete with full kitchens.
